== Introduction ==
The Distribution Strike Force, or DSF, is purposed towards the production and assembly of the <nowiki>[[UbuntuMediaCenterTeam|Ubuntu Media Center]]</nowiki> GNU/Linux distribution. The primary areas of activity include packaging, software integration, and quality assurance.
